title: Congress Eliminates Child Tax Credit, Mortgage Deduction and EITC from Tax Code
subtitle: Has Congress eliminated the child tax credit, earned income tax credit (EITC) and mortgage deductions due to the influence of Koch Industries?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Congress has eliminated the child tax credit, the earned income tax credit (EITC), and mortgage deductions from the tax code under pressure from lobby groups and the Koch brothers.
